      private void showOfferDetails(RewardsService.Offer offer)
      Helper method to show the user's offers.
      Parameters:
      offer - the offers the user has.

    • showLoading

      private void showLoading(boolean show)
      Helper method to show the loading sequence.
      Parameters:
      show - flag to check whether to show or hide the progress loading dialog.

    • loadMockData

      private void loadMockData()
      Fallback helper method if information could not be obtained from backend.

    • getSampleRewards

      private List<RewardsService.Reward> getSampleRewards()
      Helper method to get default rewards (fallback)
      Returns:
      list of rewards available to the user (fallback)

    • getSampleOffers

      private List<RewardsService.Offer> getSampleOffers()
      Helper method to get default offers (fallback)
      Returns:
      list of offers available to the user (fallback)
